p: Satureja hortensis L. (summer savory) is a well-known aromatic and medicinal plant. Some parts of the Satureja hortensis plant such as leaves, flowers, and stem are frequently used for tea or as an additive in commercial spice mixtures for a lot of food and give the food the aroma and flavour [ 18, 19, 20, 21]. Thymol, p-cymene, Î³-terpinene, and carvacrol are the main components of savory oil, exhibiting strong biological and antimicrobial activity [ 22, 23, 24, 25].
